hero.title: Nurturing Character, Excellence, and Innovation
hero.subtitle: Excellence Academy is committed to providing world-class education that develops academic excellence, strong character, and innovative thinking in every student.
home.newsSubtitle: Stay updated with the latest happenings, achievements, and upcoming events at Excellence Academy.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Hear from our students, parents, and alumni about their experience at Excellence Academy.
home.accreditationsSubtitle: Globally recognized and partnering with leading educational institutions worldwide to provide world-class education.
about.title: About Excellence Academy
about.subtitle: Building tomorrow's leaders through quality education, character development, and community engagement in the heart of Kampala.
about.missionText: To provide holistic education that nurtures character, academic excellence, and innovation, preparing students to become responsible global citizens and future leaders.
about.visionText: To be Uganda's leading educational institution, recognized for academic excellence, character development, and producing graduates who make positive impacts in society.
about.characterDesc: We prioritize moral values, integrity, and ethical behavior as the foundation of education.
about.academicDesc: Committed to high standards of learning and achievement across all subjects and levels.
about.communityDesc: Building strong relationships between students, families, and the broader community.
about.innovationDesc: Encouraging creative thinking, problem-solving, and adaptation to the modern world.
about.welcomeMessage1: Welcome to Excellence Academy, where we believe every child has the potential for greatness. For over 25 years, we have been committed to providing an education that not only excels academically but also develops character, critical thinking, and a love for learning.
about.welcomeMessage2: Our dedicated team of educators works tirelessly to create an environment where students can discover their passions, develop their talents, and prepare for a successful future. We are proud of our achievements and excited about the journey ahead.
about.leadershipDesc: Meet the dedicated educators and administrators who guide our students toward excellence.
about.experienceDesc: Visit Excellence Academy and see our state-of-the-art facilities, meet our faculty, and discover why we're the right choice for your child's education.
academics.title: Academics
academics.subtitle: Comprehensive curriculum designed to develop critical thinking, creativity, and academic excellence from O-Level to A-Level.
academics.curriculumDesc: Following the Uganda National Curriculum with enhanced programs to prepare students for UNEB examinations and beyond.
academics.oLevelDesc: Our O-Level program provides a strong foundation in core subjects, preparing students for UCE examinations and future academic pursuits.
academics.aLevelDesc: Specialized programs in Science, Arts, and Mathematics combinations, preparing students for UACE examinations and university admission.
academics.departmentsDesc: Expert faculty leading specialized departments to ensure comprehensive education.
academics.resourcesDesc: Access curriculum materials, timetables, and academic support resources.
academics.timetablesDesc: Download current term timetables for all classes
academics.guideDesc: Comprehensive guide to our academic programs
academics.policyDesc: Learn about our evaluation and grading system
academics.readyDesc: Join Excellence Academy and experience world-class education that prepares you for success in academics and life.
admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.subtitle: Join the Excellence Academy family and embark on a journey of academic excellence, character development, and lifelong learning.
admissions.prospectusDesc: Get detailed information about our programs, facilities, and admission process.
admissions.visitDesc: Book a campus tour to experience our facilities and meet our faculty.
admissions.contactDesc: Speak directly with our admissions team for personalized guidance.
admissions.requirementsDesc: Clear guidelines for admission to O-Level and A-Level programs at Excellence Academy.
admissions.feeDesc: Transparent and competitive fees for quality education with various payment options available.
admissions.additionalFees: * Additional fees may apply for uniforms, textbooks, and co-curricular activities
admissions.flexiblePayment: Flexible payment plans available. Contact our finance office for more information.
admissions.applyDesc: Start your child's journey at Excellence Academy. Complete the form below and we'll contact you within 2 business days.
contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help! Get in touch with Excellence Academy for admissions, general inquiries, or to schedule a campus visit.
contact.messageDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please call our main office.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.mapDesc: Located in the heart of Kyanja, easily accessible by public transport and private vehicles. Ample parking available on campus.
contact.campusVisitDesc: Book a personalized tour of our facilities
contact.whatsappDesc: Get instant answers to your questions
contact.faqDesc: Find quick answers to common questions about Excellence Academy.
studentLife.title: Student Life
studentLife.subtitle: Beyond academics - discover the vibrant community, clubs, sports, and activities that make Excellence Academy a home away from home.
studentLife.coCurricularDesc: Discover your passion and develop new skills through our diverse range of activities.
studentLife.houseDesc: Building character, leadership, and healthy competition through our four-house system.
studentLife.leadershipDesc: Developing tomorrow's leaders through student government and leadership opportunities.
studentLife.headDesc: Top student leaders representing the entire school community.
studentLife.prefectDesc: Student leaders maintaining discipline and supporting school activities.
studentLife.captainsDesc: Leaders organizing house activities and promoting house spirit.
studentLife.experienceDesc: See our vibrant student community in action through photos and videos of school events and activities.
studentLife.musicDesc: Choir, instrumental music, and music theory classes for all skill levels.
studentLife.visualDesc: Exploring creativity through painting, drawing, and digital arts.
studentLife.performingDesc: Drama, dance, and cultural performances throughout the year.
parents.title: For Parents
parents.subtitle: Stay connected with your child's education through our comprehensive parent resources and support services.
parents.portalDesc: Access grades, attendance, and school updates
parents.contactDesc: Get in touch with teachers and admin
parents.noticesDesc: Stay informed with the latest school announcements and important updates.
parents.downloadsDesc: Access important documents, forms, and resources for parents.
parents.supportDesc: Contact the right department for assistance with your specific needs.
parents.communityDesc: Be part of your child's educational journey. Join the Parent-Teacher Association and stay actively involved in school activities.
news.title: News & Events
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest happenings, achievements, and upcoming events at Excellence Academy.

news.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news, event updates, and important announcements directly to your inbox.
donate.title: Support Our School
donate.subtitle: Your generous donation helps us provide excellence in education and create opportunities for our students.
donate.donationDesc: Fill out the form below to make your contribution. We'll contact you with payment details.
donate.thankYouDesc: Your donation request has been received. We will contact you with payment details.
